name: Ext_R5_ActivityDefinition_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ActivityDefinition.subject[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ActivityDefinition.subject[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Type of individual the activity definition is intended for
element.definition: A code, group definition, or canonical reference that describes  or identifies the intended subject of the activity being defined.  Canonical references are allowed to support the definition of protocols for drug and substance quality specifications, and is allowed to reference a MedicinalProductDefinition, SubstanceDefinition, AdministrableProductDefinition, ManufacturedItemDefinition, or PackagedProductDefinition resource.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.subject[x]` maps to R4B `ActivityDefinition.subject[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdministrableProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ManufacturedItemDefinition)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PackagedProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceVariable)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Type of individual the activity definition is intended for

binding.description: The possible types of subjects for an activity (E.g. Patient, Practitioner, Organization, Location, etc.).
